website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use design in a fat separator that has a reasonable price point versus some other units.
pros: Bottom of the cup has a spring loaded plug, so you can easily release the strained liquid
Top strainer works efficiently to remove solids
Side of the cup is clearly marked with ounces, cups, and milliliters
All parts of this fat separator are safe to use in the dishwasher, which simplifies the cleanup process
cons: Not as successful in removing smaller solids from your liquid as some other options

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 3rd use. Important piece on bottom is apparently glued on and doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I love this design and it worked well the first two times I used it. This Thanksgiving, I poured the warm (not hot) liquid from the turkey into the Swing-A-Way and within a minute the bottom red piece popped off and the unit ejected half of the liquid before I could save it. Very poor quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Custom

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use.
customer_reviews.text: I only used this product twice, as the second time I used it, the plastic connection at the bottom of the cup broke, and was no longer useable. I was using it for draining warm juice off of my roast at the time. I wouldn't recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product fell apart after one use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product the other day for the first time. I was excited to use the product based on you tube reviews etc. While i was holding the handle it broke off in two places. the top and bottom of the handle simply separated from the device. Of course returning the item is now impossible. I would like a response from whoever built this thing with an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: It Broke Period!!
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke during 2nd use. After 1st used hand washed and dried. Good product just dont last at all
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Parker

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use at the handle hinge
customer_reviews.text: This item broke at the handle hinge the first time I tried to use it. I hope the replacement is better.
customer_reviews.author: Number Three

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately, out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke the first time I pulled the handle. Not sure if I just got one that was already cracked or what, but the portion that holds the plug on the bottom against the bottom broke right off. It is part of the plastic cup, itself, and is molded as a part of it, so the plastic itself failed. I literally could not find a replacement at the store, and I needed it for Thanksgiving the next day, so I super glued the part back on, clamped it overnight, and it then worked as advertised. I'm sure this is a great product, if you don't get a lemon...or maybe none of them are very durable. Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: I hope the inventor is making bank; they deserve it. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: This works AWESOME. I use it often. I'm a big fan of bone broths; I put bones and fat etc in a crockpot and let them simmer for days. I really want to get out all the marrow, and the flavor from the fat. I love the ease of separating the liqified fat from the broth when ready to freeze or use my broth, and I am so glad somebody genius invented it. I had always hoped for something like this, and was delighted to stumble across the listing. I hope the inventor is making bank; they deserve it. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I usually always make a stock/broth from whatever leftovers I have. I strain it into a large bowl and always had to wait hours for it to cool then scrape the fat off the top. Now I don't have to wait! I still have to do it batches, but it's better than storing a large pitcher thing that has one use. I just fill this thing and let it sit for a few minutes before draining the good stuff from the bottom! I haven't used the strainer lid because I like using a much finer strainer to get a really clean broth. I have not had any problems with leaking. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kumaraisin

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! NO QUALITY CONTROL!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. Both arrived cracked & broken at bottom release tab. From reading low ratings, it appears this is a constant complaint. My mistake for not reading the low ratings first. These gravy fat separators arrived in an undamaged package. Clearly, Swing-A-Way has poor, if any, quality control! Will certainly think twice before buying any Swing-A-Way product again! Amazon was great about return & refund!
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I have several grease separators -- this is my go-to one. Just be sure not to put really hot fluids in it or put it in the dishwasher! The glue on my previous unit dissolved and the bottom movable part fell off. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gravy Seperator!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older, cracked, beat up gravy separator & got this for MYSELF for Christmas! I LOVE it! The old one just had a spout to pour the gravy into another container, and retaining the oil at the top. This one is same principle, but I like the pull handle and spout at the bottom to empty contents in a pan, etc, to thicken, stopping when the oil or grease at top lowers to the bottom, and you release the handle! Easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: Make gravy the easy way
customer_reviews.text: We used this for Thanksgiving to make the gravy and it was so easy. Pour drippings and grease into the cup, the grease goes to top and you release remainder of drippings from the bottom of cup, into you roux. Gravy came out great and it was so much easier than trying to scoop off the grease.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Have had one that lasted for years, but replacement arrived broke.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these worked great for us, lasting for years until the plastic outlet glue gave away. This new replacement one arrived already broke in the same place. Amazon refunded upon return no problem, but we ended up replacing it with the alternate brand tube-pinch type and are even happier with that one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: This product leaks a little
customer_reviews.text: The first (and only) time I used the product the liquid leaked out of the bottom. I had to keep it over a bowl to avoid the liquid dripping all over the counter. Didn't ship it back because it was used. Probably would look for another option if I was shopping for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I have lived my life this long without one! I use this primarily when making homemade chicken stock for soups or brines. This tool make the task much easier. The handle give smooth control when returning liquids to the original container. The strainer on top ensures food particles do not clog the drain hole. It is durably constructed. I have even used it as a measuring cup when all my other cups were dirty. A great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Do not use to separate fat. Maybe use it as a planter, just dont add too much water
customer_reviews.text: I guess 1 star is as low as I can go. This thing is a piece of junk. Almost used it 1 time, but the operation was never completed. It did a great job of pouring my brisket drippings all over the counter and floor. On a good note, the dog was happy. Do not buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Burr

customer_reviews.title: Plug in the bottom of the Fat Separator was broken off
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with broken off bottom valve making it non-functional. The shipping box and display box were in perfect condition so the item must have come from the factory broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fat separator I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Just get one, I promise you'll love this! I've had so many different ones in my house, even the most expensive one I got from William Sonoma can't beat this one!! Enough said!
customer_reviews.author: P. Liew

customer_reviews.title: Same problem as others
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived in a large, well padded box. When I opened the inner box I found the o-ring on the bottom completely broken off. This is probably a design flaw -- either bad quality plastic or too much pressure on it from the insert that is moved by squeezing. In any event, I would suggest you look for another product to meet your needs; which is sad because the design is better than the others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Whetherperson

customer_reviews.title: Best fat seperator ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to clean...i have never put in in dishwasher. So quick and easy to remove the fat. I have had this for over 5 years and use it all the time when making soups and gravy. I just got a second for a gift. Best fat seperator ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Therese B

customer_reviews.title: I love this separator
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for 3 years now and am buying a second to donate for a chinese auction. I love this separator! Easily separates the grease with minimal loss of gravy and the strainer on the top saves me time in having to strain first. I put it in the dishwasher with no problems. I bought one for my son as well and he loves it. If you make gravy from scratch, you want this unit.
customer_reviews.author: L Parr

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this a four because it's leaked a couple times. You have to make sure it's closed all the way each time.
customer_reviews.author: mbxx

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This didn't last a year. I used it maybe 5 times to de-fat chicken broth to can. It works good for the first time or two then breaks at the critical area of handle and drain hole. I'd give it no stars if that was possible. The concept is great but the construction is cheap and faulty. For the price, I feel cheated!
customer_reviews.author: C. Selzler

customer_reviews.title: Works great for canning
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for use in canning to process real fruit from plus to juice.
customer_reviews.author: Species0611

customer_reviews.title: Very good design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design with the bottom release for drippings. I’ve had one for years. Best style I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Souza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for separating meat drippings to make gravy and sauces. All in one strainer and separator.
customer_reviews.author: Twinpeaker in SF

customer_reviews.title: Love this for making soups
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. Use it for defatting any broth. It is dishwasher safe but use on top rack; it will crack if the heat in dishwasher is too hot. Saves so much time...use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to get rid of the fat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when I make gravy I can have my gravy and eat it two without the fat.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fat Separator was Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the fat separator to to make turkey gravy on Thanksgiving. This product worked so well. Almost none of the fat got into my gravy and people were raving about it. Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was looking for! makes separating my braising liquids easy. Would have preferred if it was made of glass though
customer_reviews.author: LAJ473

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on Thanksgiving for the first time - made my life so much easier! What with mashing potatoes, doing sides, etc, etc etc, I didn't have to wait but 1 minute to start my gravy with total control of the amount of fat needed to make a roux. Worked like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a second time after my mom saw me using mine and commented on how much she'd love one. Works really well and such an easy way to get rid of the fat!
customer_reviews.author: The Wicked Noodle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews that complained that this product either arrived broken, or leaked. I have experienced neither scenario. The Swingaway arrived in perfect condition, and it does not leak. I used it to make gravy for Thanksgiving, and I will be using it with my Christmas dinner as well. It works exactly as advertised and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: A Write Word

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this grease separator. It's a wonderful idea and works perfectly. That being said, I am sorry to report that after two uses, a round red piece of plastic has come off. I don't know where it belongs, or I'd put it back on. I should have heeded everyone else's warnings on this. Sure wish the manufacturer could do a better job with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks the same as her old one but not as good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace her older one after I broke the handle. She advised me last night that it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: jeminfla

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Loved this -- nice design so the gravy comes out of the bottom while the fat sits on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Holiday or Not
customer_reviews.text: Did the job so we're not eating that greasy stuff in our food.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good way to separate the fat from the juices to make low-fat gravy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but the design is ingenious. Instead of allowing the juices to separate and then pour ing off the juice minus the fat through a spout, you pull a handle and the low and no-fat juices pour out through the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: just what i was wanting for years now but could never find
customer_reviews.author: An Aussie Farming in the Philippines

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. The handle broke and the metal piece hit me in the face. Not happy at all. I had to pick a star rating I think one for durability, sturdiness and east to clean is over rated
customer_reviews.author: Jacki gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pancakes, too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for making gravy but use it more when making pancakes with the kids! It's easy enough that the kids can pull the lever and make pancakes "themselves". So far, the seal that the bottom works wonderful and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Siesta Acres

customer_reviews.title: Designed by a non-cook
customer_reviews.text: There are several things which make this not user friendly. If you want a clear sauce or gravy the holes in the strainer are so big that particles go through. Secondly with the design of the slide at the bottom , it is impossible to clean. Goodwill already has the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: P McFarland

customer_reviews.title: The best gravy strainer!
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to find in the stores. They work excellently! It separates the juice and fat easily! A must have for thanksgiving! It works fast and perfectly. You will be very happy with the results!! I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good Gravy!!  So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Just a push of a button.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use when making gravy. Would be great for use with any batter (pancakes, cupcakes) too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use & Clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this product after cooking meats that leave fat. Especially straining chicken fat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bride’s request
customer_reviews.text: This was part of a gift for a bridal shower.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Its a wonderful idea, just that the way they've implemented it ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a wonderful idea, just that the way they've implemented it is not very good quality. Just assume it's going to leak and keep it over something to catch the slow leaking liquid. You get a nice clean liquid out the bottom once the fat settles.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bob Mac

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken at the plug and never bothered with returning it. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Love how it comes out the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Love how it comes out the bottom. Just make sure you have someone in the kitchen because the herbs get stuck in the hole. I had my daughter stir with a spoon as I was letting out the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Jones

customer_reviews.title: grease separator
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the design is from the old style, you do not have to tip this one and also it has a dual purpose of straining the liquid from the solid if you have onions,celery,garlic. unique design. Durable containor, can withstand the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Swing-A-Way S2062T Easy Release Grease Separator. I used it twice over the recent Thanksgiving holiday. It can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: irish9085

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband was Ideal
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for a gift. He was delighted. He loves to make gravy and this was so convenient. We learned about it from a friend who also enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Costello

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made and sturdy. Comes out of dishwasher with no problems and doesn't drip when using the release handle which flows a good amount of liquid out when using. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cherilee

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses the gasket doesnt deliver a clean stream like it did when first purchased. After a few months of usage, I avoid using anymore due to the messy spillage and dripping it causes.
customer_reviews.author: Tanglemania

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The little red piece where the liquid drains out was broken off on arrival. It appears that others have had similar issued. Returned - will purchase other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This has proven extremely helpfull in my BBQ for degreasing broth.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Olaiz Silva

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good grease separator for a while. I finally used it about a week after delivery. It works GREAT.......EXCEPT that the inner plastic ring cracked after the first load of liquid, then completely broke off on second load of liquid. Great product, shoddy materials used in construction. Unfortunately after searching the web, I can't find another grease separator of theis style. Back to chilling my sauces and scraping cuz this item only has maybe one more use before the rest of the bottom gasket breaks off
customer_reviews.author: Keith E

customer_reviews.title: Love mine...bought one for each of my children.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these for several years and think it does a super job of straining and separating.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broken with part taped to the top
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this in the mail. When I opened it, it was broken with the broken piece taped to the top. Super sad.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Function and durability
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it much yet. It does work as i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke while cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it worked, but while cleaning it, a small pin came out and was hard to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Gobbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but the concept is right on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like making soups, stews, or roasts you need one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If you like making soups, stews, or roasts you need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dislike those pour spout fat separators
customer_reviews.text: I dislike those pour spout fat separators, so when I saw this I was so happy. The valve doesn't leak and works quite well. Not sure what else you could want.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stager

customer_reviews.title: it useful for small project
customer_reviews.text: it useful for small project. if u use it for soup, it needs to be clean up the oil everytime
customer_reviews.author: Azure Cheuk Ying Ng

customer_reviews.title: sleek and useful
customer_reviews.text: like this a lot; haven't used it for its purpose yet, but used it as a dispenser for making pizzelles; excellent for that purpose; no more messy dripping everywhere. Love the one-handed design.
customer_reviews.author: jadegal

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times and I have not experienced the leaking problem noted by some other reviewers. The size is adequate for most sauces and the handle functions well. I'm looking forward to using it at Thanksgiving for turkey gravy. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: This one works beautifully! Don't hesitate to buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for Thanksgiving- so many separators don't work. This one works beautifully! Don't hesitate to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bellows

customer_reviews.title: Leaks & Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I found the red ring of plastic that is part of the sleeve the stopper slides in and out of floating around on the bottom of the container. I placed it back in the center where it belonged and then tried water in it and it leaked. Upon examination of the bottom of the red ring I found it is held in place by a very thin piece of glue. Even if it were glued properly, it's so flimsy that one or two slides of the stopper would break it away from the bottom and it would leak. Don't waste your money on this. Good idea, bad execution.
customer_reviews.author: North Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, look pretty and very nexpensive. What more could one ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: two uses
customer_reviews.text: works great for turkey gravy and as a batter dispenser for pancakes! havent had it leak yet but havent had it for lone.
customer_reviews.author: kaz

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Best invention for making gravy !!! So simple and easy to use ! This should be a staple in the kitchen! I love this so much that I bought one for my brother . Thank You !!!
customer_reviews.author: PlainJane

customer_reviews.title: Gravy making made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great asset for making gravy! So much easier to separate the grease using this! Should have had one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Linda

customer_reviews.title: Used it for Thanksgiving and loved it. First time I did not get fat ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for Thanksgiving and loved it. First time I did not get fat in my gravy and have to struggle to remove it. Best tool I have bought
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Fisher

customer_reviews.title: This design is great for small amounts of drippings where the side pitcher ...
customer_reviews.text: This design is great for small amounts of drippings where the side pitcher style fails. Built-in strainer is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith A. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This item broke before I ever used it
customer_reviews.text: There is a round circle of plastic on the bottom of the cup that broke off before I ever used it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: Soup and oil separator
customer_reviews.text: Very good in separating the real soup from the oil.
customer_reviews.author: TomDLC

customer_reviews.title: One of those "How did I live without this!" things
customer_reviews.text: Love this separator for making gravies and also use it for pancake and waffle batter. I have given as gifts and they are always appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be a Tropical Girl

customer_reviews.title: No more greasy gravy
customer_reviews.text: This is a gadget that really works. It gives you excellent control of what goes into your gravy and it is easy to get rid of the grease. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Only the Best!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A gift because I have one too, and love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

customer_reviews.title: You can't miss with this device
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grease separator I have ever had. Since the grease floats on top and you drain the sauce from underneath you have absolute control over the separation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: so I pulled out the Swing-a-way and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. After reading the reviews, I elected to hand wash. I cook a lot, so I used it first on Thanksgiving, and then the other day I made a marinade, I wanted to simmer the meat in it, but didn't want the oil, so I pulled out the Swing-a-way and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've finally found a source of raw milk in my area, and this works great for cream separation. After scooping cream off the top of the milk into this cup, more separation will occur in a couple of hours, leaving a layer of skim milk at the bottom. To be able to squeeze the handle and drain it out the bottom is the perfect solution! . . . leaving only the cream behind, pure and thick and rich. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Lenehan

customer_reviews.title: separating the grease so that you can easily use whatever part you wish from the drippings
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these for quite a while and I purchased this one to give to my friend. It works really well, separating the grease so that you can easily use whatever part you wish from the drippings. It is completely dishwasher safe and seems to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Gets the grease out!
customer_reviews.text: My wife really wanted this for Christmas. That made me happy, as it was also cheap. The best grease separator in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, easy to clean in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to read measuring marks and BPA free. Use this for making homemade broth-perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kerowyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to not like about this. No longer a struggle to separate fat. Awesome. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trix

customer_reviews.title: It came broken. I'd give it zero stars if ...
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. I'd give it zero stars if it'd let me. Spend the extra money on a decent brand. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: rachel hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Touched the handle and it broke
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box from Amazon. I squeezed the handle and the bottom part flew off, broken. My husband and I are disappointed because his mom really wanted one for Christmas. I am looking for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for BBQ folks. Save the juice but get rid of the fat very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nevets

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This item works great. I have used it twice in making soup. Very satisfied with performance. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cyntha H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly well. I make Bone Broth and this has saved me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fat Separator
customer_reviews.text: I've used this without any problems at least 15 times so far, and it does a fantastic job of separating the fat so you can retain all the flavorful juices. You can visually see the line of separation, so it's easy to see what you want to keep. To pout it out, you just pull the trigger on the handle and the juices pour out the bottom into your pot. When you get to the line of separation, you just release the trigger and you're done. At that point, I either use the juice as is, or I thicken it and make a tasty gravy from it. I probably would have wasted those juices otherwise, so I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KITCHEN TOOL
customer_reviews.text: This Grease Separator works perfectly. I have given my sister one as a gift and she loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: MarcReader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: will go back and buy these for family and friends!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Bower

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it works. So easy to get the "good" stuff . If the inside of the bottom were "funneled" slightly, it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: beths

customer_reviews.title: Best design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best design for a separator! When my 45 yo separator shot craps I was thrilled to find this updated and larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Nita Thiessen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grease separater when making gravy!!! Use as gifts for bridal showers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the pour from the top kind
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the pour from the top kind. Got some for gifts this year, mine is still going strong with several years use.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Julie

product_meta.title: Swing-A-Way 4-Cup Easy Release Fat/Gravy Separator, Red
product_meta.description: Since 1938, Swing-A-Way has created the highest quality, most dependable can openers on the market. When you reach for a Swing-A-Way, you reach for a classic. This Swing-A-Way Grease Separator has a spring loaded bottom opening that allows for easy release of grease-free liquids. It strains liquids through a new deeper removable lid and features a soft grip handle for releasing liquid with a squeeze. Its large 4-cup, 32-ounce capacity works for any type of cooking preparation. Included on the-cup are metric and standard measurements in 1/4, 1/3-cup and 2-ounce increments. This grease separator is dishwasher safe on the top rack.
feature_bullets: EASY RELEASE OF GREASE-FREE LIQUIDS: The spring loaded bottom opening allows for easy release of grease-free liquids.
REMOVABLE LID FOR EASY POURING: Strain liquids through a new deeper removable lid; the soft grip handle features a squeeze mechanism to release liquids.
STANDARD MEASUREMENTS: The metrics and metrics on the sides are standard; 1/4, 1/3 cup and 2-ounce increments.
STORE LARGE AMOUNTS OF LIQUID: The gravy separator can store up to 32-ounces or 4-cups, never have the fear of running out of room while straining large amounts.
DISHWASHER SAFE: This separator is dishwasher safe making clean up quick and easy. It is recommended to store on the top rack.
